channel.title: How do i release my client to my players?
channel.description: well ive made a client used from a base and basically redone it, although what i want to know is how do i get it to my players?

item.title: How do i release my client to my players?
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

no ill do it step by step.
1:right click the folder and click add to .rar
2:go to uppit.com-mediafire.com(recommended cuz no wait time to dl)-tinypic-and some others i really can’t think of and upload it.
3:once you get the link for your download post it like this

<a href=."your client dl link here">Client Download Here</a> w/o the ^ the little period after the equal sign(had to do that so the code wouldn't work)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i release my client to my players?

item.title: How do i release my client to my players?
item.dc:creator: @monkeykid300 monkeykid300
item.description:
@monkeykid300 wrote:

Ok If the folder is on desktop right click then do add to archive. Add it to desktop then upload the rar. file! Don’t upload the folder! It wont work lol. Try uploading it to uppit.com or one of those…
